name: Oh no! You are on the sun orbit!
name_original: Oh no! You are on the sun orbit!
description:
A submission for oh no (bitsy jam) made during 3 hours.

"Oh no! You are on sun orbit!" - is super-great adventure game from creators of "Oh no! You got  lost in forest" and "Oh no! You have lost your pants!", in which you'll be on the sun orbit. THE UNBELIEVABLE ENDING IS WAITING FOR U!!!!!!!!!!!
